# Creating a figure theme for all plots
```{r message=FALSE}
HStheme <- function(){            
  theme_bw()+                          
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 12), 
        text = element_text(family = "sans"), 
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 12),
        plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 16, vjust = 1, hjust = 0.5),
        axis.title = element_text(size = 14),
        panel.grid = element_blank(),
        plot.margin = unit(c(0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5), units = , "cm"),
        plot.title = element_text(size = 20, vjust = 1, hjust = 0.5),
        legend.text = element_text(size = 12),
        legend.title = element_blank())
}
```



## PCA of all sporophytic variables
```{r}
# Omitt all rows with nas
data.nona <- na.omit(data)

SPOR.PCA <- prcomp(data.nona[,c(7:12)], center = TRUE, scale. = TRUE)

summary(SPOR.PCA)
print(SPOR.PCA)


(PCA.p1 <- autoplot(prcomp(data.nona[,c(7:12)], center = TRUE, scale. = TRUE), 
         data = data.nona, colour = 'location', 
         loadings = TRUE, 
         loadings.colour = 'black',
         loadings.label = TRUE, 
         loadings.label.size = 4, 
         loadings.label.colour = 'black', 
         loadings.label.hjust = 1, 
         loadings.label.vjust = 0,
         frame = TRUE, frame.type = 't') +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#104E8B", "#B22222")) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#104E8B", "#B22222")) +
  xlim(-0.4,0.4) +
  ylim(-0.4,0.4) +
  HStheme())

# Saving graph
ggsave("figures/PCA1.png", width = 7, height = 5, dpi = 300)

(PCA.p2 <- autoplot(prcomp(data.nona[,c(7:12)], center = TRUE, scale. = TRUE), x=2, y=3, 
         data = data.nona, colour = 'location', 
         loadings = TRUE, 
         loadings.colour = 'black',
         loadings.label = TRUE, 
         loadings.label.size = 4, 
         loadings.label.colour = 'black', 
         loadings.label.hjust = 0, 
         loadings.label.vjust = 0,
         frame = TRUE, frame.type = 't') +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#104E8B", "#B22222")) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#104E8B", "#B22222")) +
  xlim(-0.4,0.4) +
  ylim(-0.4,0.4) +
  HStheme())

# Saving graph
ggsave("figures/PCA2.png", width = 7, height = 5, dpi = 300)

(PCA.p3 <- autoplot(prcomp(data.nona[,c(7:12)], center = TRUE, scale. = TRUE), x=1, y=3, 
         data = data.nona, 
         colour = 'location', 
         loadings = TRUE, 
         loadings.colour = 'black',
         loadings.label = TRUE, 
         loadings.label.size = 4, 
         loadings.label.colour = 'black', 
         loadings.label.hjust = 0, 
         loadings.label.vjust = 0,
         frame = TRUE, frame.type = 't') +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#104E8B", "#B22222")) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#104E8B", "#B22222")) +
  xlim(-0.4,0.4) +
  ylim(-0.4,0.4) +
  HStheme())

# Saving graph
ggsave("figures/PCA3.png", width = 7, height = 5, dpi = 300)


ggplot(data.nona, aes(CPS,CCHPL)) +
  geom_point()



(stacked_PCA <- ggpubr::ggarrange(PCA.p1, PCA.p2, PCA.p3, ncol = 1,
                                  labels = c("A", "B", "C"),
                                  common.legend = TRUE, 
                                  legend = "right"))

ggsave("figures/PCA.sporStack.png", width = 6, height = 11)

# https://www.datacamp.com/community/tutorials/pca-analysis-r
```


## 3D plot with first 3 principal componenets
```{r}

SPOR.PCA <- prcomp(data.nona[,c(7:12)], center = TRUE, scale. = TRUE)
loca <- factor(data.nona$location)

summary(loca)

pca3d(SPOR.PCA, group = loca, 
      show.ellipses=TRUE, 
      ellipse.ci=0.75, 
      show.plane=FALSE, 
      palette = c("#00BFFF", "#FF4040"),)

snapshotPCA3d(file="first_plot.png")
```

Get PCA individual data
```{r}
ID_PCA <- get_pca_ind(SPOR.PCA)
head(ID_PCA$coord)

coor <- predict(SPOR.PCA, newdata = data.nona)

ALL <- cbind(data.nona, coor)



t.test(PC1 ~ location, ALL)
t.test(PC2 ~ location, ALL)
t.test(PC3 ~ location, ALL)



# Data Visualization
(SPOR_PC1 <- ggplot(ALL, aes(x = location, PC2, fill = location)) +     geom_boxplot(alpha = 0.8) +
    scale_fill_manual(values = c("#104E8B", "#B22222")) +
    labs(x = "Region", y = "PC2")+
    HStheme() +
    theme(legend.position = "none"))

# Saving graph
ggsave("figures/SPOR_PC1.png", width = 7, height = 5, dpi = 300)



# Data Visualization
(SPOR_PC1 <- ggplot(ALL, aes(x = location, PC3, fill = location)) +     geom_boxplot(alpha = 0.8) +
    scale_fill_manual(values = c("#104E8B", "#B22222")) +
    labs(x = "Region", y = "PC3")+
    HStheme() +
    theme(legend.position = "none"))

# Saving graph
ggsave("figures/SPOR_PC1.png", width = 7, height = 5, dpi = 300)

```
